name: Scribble+
description: Scribble+ is the quick-draw, multiplayer party-game designed from the ground up to be playable by the whole family, anywhere in the world (especially with Twitch integration!). All you need is connection to a web-browser, and any phone, tablet, laptop or desktop can become a controller.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: Keyboard
